item.title: BACKSTORY
item.description: I have been an IT enthusiast for most of my life. Really ever since my Dad started showing me how to upgrade our family computer so I could play Lego Island in the late 90s. I got the game as a present, but after installing it the game was completely unplayable. We needed a graphics card.
